{"id":280608406,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1574342841,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"72 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/280608406/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Island Perimeter","memory":"16.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int islandPerimeter(const vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        const size_t height = grid.size();\n        if(height == 0) return 0;\n        const size_t width = grid[0].size();\n        \n        int output = accumulate(grid[0].begin(), grid[0].end(), 0) * 2;\n        \n        for(size_t i = 1; i < height; ++i)\n            for(size_t j = 0; j < width; ++j)\n                output += 2 * grid[i][j] - (grid[i][j] == grid[i - 1][j] && grid[i][j]);\n        \n        for(size_t i = 0; i < height; ++i)\n            for(size_t j = 1; j < width; ++j)\n                output -= grid[i][j] == grid[i][j - 1] && grid[i][j];\n        \n        return output * 2;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"island-perimeter"}
